snippet: A study found that the number of people arriving in Switzerland from other countries for help with suicide increased steadily from 2009 to 2012.
abstract: Study in Journal of Medical Ethics reports increase in number of people from other countries traveling to Switzerland to commit assisted suicide under auspices of right-to-die organizations.
lead_paragraph: A study found that the number of people arriving in Switzerland from other countries for help with suicide increased steadily from 2009 to 2012.

headline.main: More People Going to Switzerland for Assisted Suicide, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Switzerland: More Foreigners Drawn by Assisted Suicide Law, Study Shows
